column2: Sunny- light-moderate winds. 5" rain 48 hours prior and 1.2" of rain Saturday and Sunday.
sunny- light-moderate winds. 1st water sample with assist from Sandy Wickman.
moderate winds- partly sunny. done in conjunction with water sampling.
Light-Moderate winds- heavy overcast. Done in conjunction with post ice out lake chemistry.
sunny- calm. Ideal conditions for Secchi.
mostly cloudy- moderate winds. Not good conditions for Secchi- but done in conjunction with water chemistries.
Mostly sunny- moderate winds. Not ideal but done in conjunction with water samples.
Sunny- moderate to strong winds. Done in conjunction with water chemistry samples.
sunny- light winds- perfect conditions. Water looked exceptionally clear prior to measurement.
Mostly sunny- light winds. 18 hours after 1.3? of rain. One 2 week old loon chick!
Sunny- moderate-strong winds. Done in conjunction with lake chemistry samples.
Sunny- light winds- done in conjunction with water chemistry samples.
